Official Citation: 512 U.S. 849

The dissent cites the same statutes, analyzes the same textual provisions, and provides alternative interpretations of the key legal questions. While the dissent also raises broader federalism concerns, it maintains substantial engagement with the majority's specific reasoning throughout."
